content.en: Virtual Rehab Revolution: Researchers have been exploring the use of virtual reality (VR) and robotics in rehabilitation for various conditions, such as cerebral palsy and stroke. These technologies, combined with algorithms, are being used to create personalized training programs and assessments for patients. For example, the NJIT-RAVR system combines adaptive robotics with complex VR simulations for children with cerebral palsy, while the Rehabilitation Gaming System (RGS) combines VR with psychometric evaluation for stroke patients. These advancements have shown promising results in improving motor function and quality of life for patients.
content.da: Virtuel Rehabiliteringsrevolution: Forskere har udforsket brugen af virtuel virkelighed (VR) og robotteknologi i rehabilitering for forskellige tilstande, såsom cerebral parese og slagtilfælde. Disse teknologier, kombineret med algoritmer, bruges til at skabe personligt tilpassede træningsprogrammer og vurderinger for patienter. For eksempel kombinerer NJIT-RAVR systemet adaptive robotter med komplekse VR-simulationer for børn med cerebral parese, mens Rehabilitation Gaming System (RGS) kombinerer VR med psykometrisk evaluering for slagtilfærdspatienter. Disse fremskridt har vist lovende resultater i forbedring af motorisk funktion og livskvalitet for patienterne.
